entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the person who has sent a letter requesting an appointment to Mrs. Cole.

entities.name: mrs cole
entities.description: Mrs. Cole is introduced as the person who receives Dumbledore's letter and invites him for an appointment.

entities.name: billy stubbs
entities.description: Billy Stubbs is mentioned as a patient with scabs.

entities.name: eric whalley
entities.description: Eric Whalley is mentioned as a patient with chicken pox.

entities.name: martha
entities.description: Martha is mentioned as the person who needs iodine.

relationships.description: Dumbledore visits Mrs. Cole at her place.
Mrs. Cole cares for Billy Stubbs by sending him iodine.
Mrs. Cole cares for Eric Whalley by sending him iodine.
